comment.body: I got a CB3-431 and using GalliumOS, sadly, the sound is not working

Is Whatsapp safer than Telegram? After looking at their security white paper [1], they don't store keys and use ECDH as key exchange, AES256 as cipher and SHA256 as HMAC, sounds like normal TLS would use  

[1] https://www.whatsapp.com/security/WhatsApp-Security-Whitepaper.pdf
@Anonymous2: Yeah, you're right. Let's reverse engineering it !
@Flyman: A more natural translation is `God damn it GFW !`
maybe recreate a empty folder and change to read-only
Chromebook is a great alternative if you have enough skills of using linux
